title: Local Rigidity and Six Functor Formalisms
abstract:
The coefficient categories of six functor formalisms are often locally rigid,
and when this is the case, the exceptional pushforward and pullback adjunctions
may be defined formally. In this short note it is shown that for f a proper map
resp. an open embedding the well known formulas f_! = f_* resp. f_! = f_# may
likewise be deduced formally.
